title: My Painting Tips
script:
Anushka: Namaste doston! Aaj main aap sabhi se apni painting tips share karna chahti hoon.
Anushka: Painting, mere liye sirf ek hobby nahi, ek passion hai.
Anushka: Sabse pehle, sahi rang chuno. Rangon ka chayan hi aadha kaam kar deta hai!
Anushka: Main hamesha achi quality ke paints use karti hoon, thoda mehenga zaroor hai, par result kamaal ka hota hai!
Anushka: Dusri tip, patiently layers banana. Jaldi nahi karni chahiye! Ek layer sookhne ke baad hi doosra layer lagao.
Anushka: Teesra, brush strokes ka dhyan rakho. Har brush stroke ka ek matlab hota hai, use soch samajh kar use karo.
Anushka: Aur haan, reference photo use karna mat bhoolna!
Anushka: Sabse important tip? Darro mat! Experiment karo. Naye colours mix karo.
Anushka: Koi bhi perfect nahi hota. Main bhi abhi seekh rahi hoon.
Anushka: Isliye, brush uthao aur shuru ho jao!
Anushka: Last but not the least, enjoy the process! Painting karte waqt khush raho, wohi sabse zaroori hai.
Anushka: Aap sabhi ko painting ki shubhkaamnaayein! Dhanyavaad!
